title: VR-Based Advanced Mastery Course on Accounting Equations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Accounting Principles and Understanding of Financial Statements
context.additional_context: Overcoming temporal/spatial constraints through smartphone-based VR learning, enhancing practical applicability for managerial learners

learning_goals: Identify the five core elements of the accounting equation (assets, liabilities, equity, revenue, expenses) with 90% accuracy in a virtual reality simulation
Analyze double-entry accounting transactions with 85% accuracy using non-traditional learning materials (e.g., visual metaphors, interactive simulations) in a VR environment
Complete a 30-minute VR learning module three times per week in a mobile environment and achieve at least 80 points on formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
